user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my sister who is a music lover. Can you suggest some top artists - duo/group and popular songs from Soundcloud that she would enjoy? Additionally, provide me with some fun party games and decoration ideas.

TaskList.description: Research and retrieve a list of popular music artists (duos/groups) from Soundcloud.
Fetch a selection of popular songs by the retrieved artists from Soundcloud.
Compile a list of fun party games suitable for a birthday party.
Gather decoration ideas appropriate for a music-themed birthday party.
